  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XoxGameReadOnly
    public class XoxGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements XoxGameReadOnly
    Represents the state of a Xox running game.

      • isFirstPlayer

        public boolean isFirstPlayer​(PlayerReadOnly player)
        Helper method that resolves a player object. Returns true if the provided player object is the first player (creator) of the game.
        Parameters:
        player - as the object to test.
        Returns:
        true if the provided player matches the creator of this game. False otherwise.
